quests.desc: I hope you're ready to go into rooms and interact with objects, because you've just entered TextWorld! First stop, move south. That done, travel east. And then, make an attempt to head east. With that over with, travel north. Then, make an effort to head north. If you can manage that, venture north. That done, make an attempt to go to the west. Okay, and then, attempt to take a trip south. Okay, and then, make an effort to take a trip south. Then, recover the cushion from the floor of the chamber. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a chamber. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You can see a couch. The couch is normal.[if there is something on the s_0] On the couch you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] The couch appears to be empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You're now in a workshop.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the closet.

 You see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The box contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: parlor
infos.desc:
You are in a parlor. An ordinary kind of place. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?

 Oh, great. Here's a bench. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the bench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
I am sorry to announce that you are now in the canteen. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 Oh, great. Here's a American limited edition locker.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The American limited edition locker contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The American limited edition locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a cabinet. Now that's what I call TextWorld![if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_2]. You check the price tag glued to the cabinet. 60 bucks? What a deal! You'll have to ask where they got this![end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] fridge, which looks typical, close by.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The fridge contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The fridge is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. An ordinary kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You've entered a recreation zone. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You arrive in a cubicle. A typical one.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've entered a study.

 As if things weren't amazing enough already, you can even see a locker. You wonder idly who left that here.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: salon
infos.desc:
This might come as a shock to you, but you've just moved into a salon. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a vault.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a chest.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
You have stumbled into an attic. Not the attic you'd expect. No, this is an attic. You start to take note of what's in the room.

 You see a counter. [if there is something on the s_2]You see [a list of things on the s_2] on the counter.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]However, the counter, like an empty counter, has nothing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the counter.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a cellar.

 You see a non-euclidean box.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_6]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The non-euclidean box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedroom
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a bedroom.

 You can see a dresser. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a playroom. A normal kind of place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a lavender scented locker.[if c_8 is open and there is something in the c_8] The lavender scented locker contains [a list of things in the c_8].[end if][if c_8 is open and the c_8 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You've just sauntered into a laundromat.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bar
infos.desc:
I just think it's great that you've just entered a bar.

 You can make out a non-euclidean safe.[if c_9 is open and there is something in the c_9] The non-euclidean safe contains [a list of things in the c_9].[end if][if c_9 is open and the c_9 contains nothing] What a letdown! The non-euclidean safe is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. A typical kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an unblocked exit to the north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the shower.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a formless safe.[if c_10 is open and there is something in the c_10] The formless safe contains [a list of things in the c_10]. You wonder idly who left that here.[end if][if c_10 is open and the c_10 contains nothing] The formless safe is empty! What a waste of a day![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south.

infos.name: lounge
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in the place we're calling the lounge.

 You can see a rectangular locker.[if c_11 is open and there is something in the c_11] The rectangular locker contains [a list of things in the c_11]. Make a note of this, you might have to put stuff on or in it later on.[end if][if c_11 is open and the c_11 contains nothing] The rectangular locker is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You make out a bed stand. The bed stand is usual.[if there is something on the s_3] On the bed stand you can make out [a list of things on the s_3]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] However, the bed stand, like an empty bed stand, has nothing on it. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the bed stand.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc: The passageway looks ominous. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First off, make an effort to travel south. After that, take a trip east. After that, attempt to go to the east. Then, make an effort to head north. After that, make an effort to venture north. After that, make an attempt to take a trip north. Next, travel west. Okay, and then, travel south. Okay, and then, attempt to head south. Following that, recover the cushion from the floor of the chamber. Got that? Good!
